amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 109-386 to prevent the National Uniformity for Food Act from affecting any State law, regulation, proposition or other action that establishes a notification requirement regarding the presence or potential effects of mercury in fish and shellfish.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 168 (Roll no. 30).
